document_data.name: ''Arknor's Vile Voice''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arknor's Vile Voice''''' was an enchanted [[ring]] that improved the wearer's physical shape and muscle tone and a part of the ''Fading Rings'' set.
document_data.Description: ''Arknor's Vile Voice'' appeared as a regular ring that exuded strong pungent odor.
document_data.Powers: When worn, ''Arknor's Vile Voice'' improved strength and constitution as well as allowed the spell of ''[[Melf's acid arrow]]'' to be cast.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Arknor's Vile Voice'' came to be possessed by a mysterious monument, ''the Great Stone Head'', located in the [[Nightingale Court]] in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. In exchange for one of the ''[[eidolon]]s'', small totem statues depicting various gods, the monument dispensed powerful magic rings, one being the ''Arknor's Vile Voice''.
